channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Uranus's swaying moons will help spacecraft seek out hidden oceans
item.description: A new computer model can be used to detect and measure interior oceans on the ice covered moons of Uranus. The model works by analyzing orbital wobble...

item.title: A clue to what lies beneath the bland surfaces of Uranus and Neptune
item.description: When Voyager 2 flew by Uranus and Neptune 40 years ago, astronomers were surprised that it detected no global dipole magnetic fields, like Earth's. Th...

item.title: Bats' amazing plan B for when they can't hear
item.description: When bats can't hear, new research finds that these hearing-dependent animals employ a remarkable compensation strategy.
